tab1.text1:
Welcome to TGP, We are an ever expanding Australian Ark community.


You will find during your time here at TGP we are a close community that loves a bit of banter but always looks out for one another at heart.
We arent interested in having Bob's wiped and the pop crushed end of story. So take your time, build up and fight the bigger more established members. and most importantly have some fun!

If you are New dont forget you can claim 1 PvP kit per hour and 1 Starter Pack every 24 hours via typing <TextStyle.White>/starter & /kit</> 

Here you can find our  <TextStyle.White>Server Info</>, <TextStyle.Red>Rules!</>, <TextStyle.Yellow>Drops</>, <TextStyle.Orange>Tip's</>.
so make sure you take your time and have a look around to best familiarise yourself with our community!









<TextStyle.Red>We have an incredily strong admin team</> so if ever you feel like you require assistance
Please dont hesistate to reach out to us via discord, The link is <TextStyle.Blue>discord.gg/tgp</>

tab2.text1: Here you will find a list of our clusters general settings and tribe based limits,Base Rates:,:status_Crafting: Harvest = 10x,:status_taming: Taming = 10x,:status_explorer_note_buff: XP = 5x,:status_Encumbered:  Stack Size = 10x,:structures_cave: Custom Caves = Yes,Turrets:,:structures_Auto_Turret: Turret Limit = 150,:structures_Heavy_Auto_Turret: Turret Damage = 2x,Transfers:,:item_tribute:  Tribute Transfers = Enabled,:item_Element:  Element Transfers = Enabled,:item_artifact:  Artifact Transfers = Enabled,Dinos:,:dino_carbonemys: Saddle Cap = OFFICIAL,:status_Ready_for_War: Dino Limit = 500per tribe,:status_Digesting: Tamed Food Drain = 0.75%,:status_embryo: Wild Dino Wipe = Daily @ 3AM AEST, Players:,:cosmetic_Top_Hat: Equipment Cap = OFFICIAL,:status_Imprinted: Tribe Size = 6 Man,:status_Stamina_Drain_Reduction: Allies = DISABLED,:status_Digesting: Food & Water Drain = 0.50% (halved),:a1_White_Crate:  Kits + Shop = Start Kit & In-Game Store,Cryopod/Cryo Gun Settings,:item_cryo_gun:  - Range = 3 Foundations,:status_Cryo_Cooldown: - Official Cryo cooldown/sickness,:item_Cryofridge: - Cryofridge Requirements Disabled,:status_cryo_no: - Throwing Cryopods Disabled within 8 Foundations of an Enemy,:status_cryo_no: - Disabled Cryo Capture within 30 seconds of dealing/recieving damage
tab2.text2: Here you will find a list of the changes we have made to players and dinos either base stats or per level stats. If a stat isn't listed here it is safe to assume it's OFFICIAL,:implant_Alpha: Players,:stat_Health: + 20 Per Level,:stat_Stamina: + 20 Per Level,:stat_Oxygen: + 100 Per Level,:stat_Food: + 25 Per Level,:stat_Water:  + 25 Per Level,:stat_Weight: + 250 Per Level,:stat_Melee_Damage: + 7.5% Per Level,:stat_Fortitude:  + 10 Per Level,:stat_Crafting_Skill:  + 15% Per Level,:dino_otter: Dinos,:stat_Health: + 6.75% Per Level,:stat_Weight: + 50% Per Level,:stat_Stamina: + 2x Base Wild Stam + Official Per Level (10%)

tab3.text1: General Settings,:status_hydrated_dino:Dinosaur Maturing:  = 30x,:status_embryo:Dinosaur Incubating: = 12x,:status_Ready_for_War: Mating interval: = 32 minutes 24 seconds - 86 minutes 24 seconds,Baby Settings,:status_Stamina_Drain_Reduction: Anyone Can Cuddle: Enabled,:consumable_Cooked_Prime_Meat: Baby Food Consumption: = reduced by 50%,:status_Imprinted: Imprinting: = 24 minute intervals, 1 - 3 imprints required
tab3.text2: CONSUMABLES! MEDBREW = 10x TintoBerry + 1 Narc + 1 Water, VEGGIECAKES = 2x Honey, Carrots, Corn and Potatos + 25x Thatch + 4x Stimulants + 1 water, MINDWIPE = 50x Narc/Stimulant + 10x RareFlower/Mushroom + 12x CookedPrimMeat + 100x MejoBerry and 1 Water.  AMMUNITIONS! ARB = 5x GunPowder + 1xMetalIngot,  NARCARROWS = 5x NarcBerrys + 1 Stone Arrow, CANNONBALL = 50x CP + 250x Gunpowder + 200x MetalIngot + 75x Obsidian (To Dissuade Cannon Raiding).  RESOURCES! CP = 4x Stone + 4x Chitin or Keratin
tab3.text3: TRIBUTE DROPS! All Dino Tributes drop at 2 to 3x Official Rates. BASIC DROPS! WHITE: Prime Starter Flak and tools, BONUS = Better Kit. GREEN: Prim starter taming kit + random tamiong food, BONUS = Better Foods. BLUE: Building supplies, BONUS = Andvanced Building Supplies. PURPLE: Boss Artifacts & Chibis, BONUS = ALL Artifacts. YELLOW: PreMade Saddles, BONUS = Saddle BP's. RED: Saddle and PvP BP's, BONUS = Up to x2 Loot. CAVE/DEEPSEA/DESERTDROPS = OFFICIAL. BOSS DROPS! GAMMA = 1 Tool, 1 Weapon & 1 Armor BP's of Apprentice+ Quality. BETA = 1 Tool, 1 Weapon & 1 Armor BP's of Journeyman+ Quality. ALPHA = 1 Tool, 1 Weapon & 1 Armor BP's of Mastercraft Quality. All drops are 3x'd on the Center!

tab4.text1: All Punishments are at the discretion of the attending admins, If you wish to be treated with fairness and respect then please treat our staff the same way.  Rule 1: Please take a clip/screenshot and or any other evidence you can gather before submitting a ticket. we may be unable to provide a resolution without proof!.  RULE 2: Bullying/Racism, We all love a good laugh and there's no better way to get there than banter. This does not excuse picking on somebody for their own personal lives or ethnicity. Excess hate speech will not be tolerated. Rule 3: Names, No using names like Admin, 123, human, barcode style name, or any other such iterations of names like these, Admins will rename you at their discretion. Rule 4: Impersonating staff will result in an immediate and permanent ban from any and all of TGP's Services. RULE 5: No promoting other servers or discords. if you wish to do this then ask us via a ticket. Rule 6: Intentionally causing lag or service interruption for others and sharing any identifying information without permission is unacceptable. (Instant Permanant Ban) RULE 7: No Interfering with an admins work, If you are asked to stop or move along, please do so. Punishments! First Offence ↪Warning Issued and Tribe Logged for daily checks/surveillance, Second Offence ↪All players involved banned for 1 week, Third Offence ↪All players involved receive a Season Long Ban
tab4.text2: Rule 1 Mesh Biting:Putting a dinos head inside of the mesh and proceeding to attack is considered mesh biting, using this tactic in defence of a cave is unacceptable (Your dino will be given to your enemies as punishment), Rule 2 - Caging: You are allowed to cage a player for up to an hour. If you get caged, submit a ticket. Rule 3 - Box Platforms: You are only permitted to build a box around the rider of a dino. Any attempts to seal the dino in structures will result in a tribe wipe. Rule 4 - Cheating/Hacking/Exploits:This isn't single player, anyone caught using Cheats, Hacks or Exploits will be permanently removed from our cluster with no chance at appeal (Absolutely unacceptable and ruins the game). Rule 5 - Bullying/Grieving: This includes but isnt limited to - Harassing a single player or tribe constantly, Refusing to leave someone alone to rebuild after a raid, Picking on new players (beach bobs), Insulting beyond banter (taking shit personal)We defend the bobs on this server!thanks. Rule 6 - Tame Sniping: We do not allow player Tame sniping someone's dinosaurs left at their base unless you have built a fob and are attempting a raid/base PVP (To Be clear - No raid base/fob means No Tame Sniping. THIS RULE APPLYS TO DINOS IN SOMEONES BASE).
tab4.text3: Rule 1 - Banned Locations: Swamp Cave, Top of Volcano, Major Resource Spawns, Inside the Mesh (Your base will be red gunned without warning). Rule 2 - Meshing: Any form of building within the mesh whether as little as a foundation to block building all the way to a full blown base is completely and utterly unacceptable (You will be season banned at a minimum). Rule 3 - Teleporters: Teleporters are okay near banned locations so long as they are NOT blocking the area.  If your teleporter is deemed too close to resources or effecting other players it will be red gunned without warning (Anywhere that isn't a banned location is fair game for teleporters). Rule 4 - Spam: Do not go crazy with spam, keep everything within render of your closest turret tower (not including shitty little pill boxes). Rule 5 - Fortnite: No playing fortnite and building up into someone else's base. Clear the spam. First!. Rule 6 - Base Spots: If you need a chair, sleeping bag, grapple hook or any other strange obscure method of entering your base, it is illegal (This will result in an instant red gun!).
tab4.text4: Rule 1 - Tribe Limits & Name: Tribes are limited to 6 persons with no allies. This means you are required to have a consistent roster of tribe members and the same name across all of our servers. If they are in your tribe on The Island then they must also be in your tribe on Scorched Earth (6 man max, No Allies, No Exceptions). Rule 2 - Teaming: If you are caught teaming with another tribe, this includes but is not limited to helping another tribe to either raid or defend from a raid, coming to the aid of another in a PvP manner (Avoiding conflict, PVE and trading is not illegal). Rule 3  - Insiding & Reverse Insiding: All tribes belong to the OWNER of the tribe, this means if it is your decision to leave a tribe then you are required to only take what is given/permitted by the owner of said tribe. If you are being kicked/removed from your tribe, it is the responsibility of an owner to provide fair compensation for your efforts towards the tribe (please treat each other with respect and dignity, don't invite strangers). Rule 4 - Report Rule breaking: If you find yourself in a sticky situation where one of your tribe mates are breaking the rules. Submit a ticket to our team, we will happily provide immunity to any tribe members not involved in any bannable offence, So long as they didn't sit back and watch/let it happen (While we do not expect you to snitch on your friends, you cant get mad if they get you banned).
